title: Mind Cuffed: Eight Erotic Fantasies Unlocked
description: Mind Cuffed is not an ordinary book of sexual content targeting adults; Every story is a journey of a woman you can easily relate to. There are eight different plots and eight different women that explore their "sexual fantasies‚Äù. How sinful can your Passion get? Bigger than your darkest guilt?? No frills, no hype, no apologies; pure delightful passionately engaging unrestrained erotica. Read on and enjoy!And... It is not just a book; it is a voice, on behalf of all the suppressed voices of most of the women in India; it is a collection of erotic stories written by an Indian woman, for Indian women.
author: Bhairavi Sharma
